briefTitle: Pilot Mammography Reader Study to Assess Breast Cancer Detection in FFDM Plus DBT Versus FFDM Alone
officialTitle: A Multi-Reader Multi-Case Controlled Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Comparative Accuracy of the Fujifilm Full Field Digital Mammography (FFDM) Plus Digital Breast Tomosynthesis (DBT) Versus FFDM Alone in the Detection of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Compare Per Subject Area Under Curve (AUC): FFDM Only vs DBT Plus FFDM
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female subjects participating in FMSU004A protocol with known clinical status

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects with unknown clinical status not participating in FMSU004A protocol.
